headline: How The Investment Story Is Shifting For Extra Space Storage (EXR)
summary: The latest analyst update on Extra Space Storage includes a slight bump in fair value, with the price target moving from US$149.70 to US$150.95, roughly US$1.25 per share. That small shift lines up with a mixed research backdrop, where some firms are lifting targets into the low to mid US$140s while others trim expectations as they revisit their 2026 outlooks for self storage REITs. As you read on, you will see how these different views shape the evolving narrative around Extra Space Storage...
